title: Enhance site-wide animations and visual polish

requirements.summary: Add smooth page transition animation (fade-in + slide-up) when navigating between routes
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to any route triggers a visible fade-in + slide-up transition on the page content.
Transition duration is smooth (200–400ms) and does not feel jarring.
All existing routes continue to render correctly.

file_operations.description: Wrap the Outlet component with a transition wrapper that applies fade-in and slide-up animations on route changes. Use CSS classes and key-based re-mounting to trigger the animation on each navigation.
Add CSS keyframe animations for page-transition-enter (fade-in + translateY slide-up) with 300ms duration and ease-out timing. Define the .page-transition class to apply these animations.

requirements.summary: Add floating animated glow orbs/gradient blobs as decorative background elements on Hero, About, and Event Details pages
acceptanceCriteria: Glowing orb/blob elements are visible in the Hero section background.
Glowing orb/blob elements appear on the About and Event Details pages.
Orbs animate continuously (drift or pulse) with a slow, smooth CSS keyframe animation.
Orbs do not overlap or obscure any text or interactive elements.

file_operations.description: Add two or three absolutely positioned div elements with large radial-gradient backgrounds (green gradient colors) behind the hero content. Position them with z-index below text content and apply the drift-orb CSS animation class.
Add two absolutely positioned gradient orb div elements as decorative background elements, positioned to not obscure the feature cards. Apply the drift-orb CSS animation class.
Add two absolutely positioned gradient orb div elements as background decoration, ensuring they remain behind the timeline and event details content. Apply the drift-orb CSS animation class.
Add CSS keyframe animation 'drift-orb' with slow continuous movement (translate + scale pulses over 20-30s) and define the .glow-orb utility class with blur filter and appropriate z-index.

requirements.summary: Enhance Coordinators section cards with a shimmer/shine sweep animation on hover
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering a coordinator card triggers a visible left-to-right shine/shimmer sweep animation.
The shimmer uses a semi-transparent white or light-green gradient.
Existing hover lift-and-glow animations are preserved and not broken.
Animation is smooth and does not flicker.

file_operations.description: Add a CSS class to coordinator cards that includes a ::before pseudo-element with a linear-gradient shimmer overlay. On hover, trigger a translateX animation that sweeps the shimmer from left to right over 600-800ms.

Add CSS keyframe animation 'shimmer-sweep' that translates a gradient overlay from -100% to 200% horizontally. Define .coordinator-card-shimmer class with ::before pseudo-element styling and hover trigger.

requirements.summary: Add typewriter text animation to the event tagline in the Hero section
acceptanceCriteria: The hero tagline text animates in as a typewriter effect (characters appear one by one).
The typewriter effect starts after the hero section's entrance fade-in animation.
The effect completes within 2–4 seconds.
A blinking cursor is shown at the end of the tagline while typing, then disappears or fades out.

file_operations.description: Wrap the tagline text in a component that implements a typewriter effect using a React state hook and useEffect. Display characters incrementally with a setTimeout interval. Add a blinking cursor span that is removed after typing completes. Start the effect after a 500ms delay to allow initial fade-in.
Add CSS keyframe animation 'blink-cursor' for the typewriter cursor with opacity toggle every 500ms. Define .typewriter-cursor utility class.

requirements.summary: Add staggered bounce-in animation to analytics cards and tab buttons in Admin Dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard analytics cards animate in with a staggered scale-up + fade-in on first load.
Each card has an incremental delay (e.g., 0ms, 100ms, 200ms).
Animation is smooth and does not affect layout or data display.
Existing dashboard functionality (tabs, table, search) is unaffected.

file_operations.description: Apply staggered animation classes to the analytics cards at the top of the dashboard. Use inline style with animationDelay (0ms, 100ms, 200ms, 300ms) for each card. Add the bounce-in animation class to each card element.
Add CSS keyframe animation 'bounce-in' with scale-up (0.8 to 1) and fade-in (opacity 0 to 1) over 400ms with ease-out timing. Define .bounce-in utility class with animation-fill-mode: both.

requirements.summary: Add pulsing ring/ripple animation around the 'Register Now' CTA button on Landing Page and Hero section
acceptanceCriteria: The CTA button on LandingPage.tsx has a continuously looping ripple/pulse ring animation.
The CTA button in Hero.tsx has the same ripple/pulse ring animation.
The ring is green/semi-transparent and expands outward before fading.
Animation loops indefinitely without pausing.
Button remains fully clickable and functional.

file_operations.description: Wrap the 'Register Now' button in a relative-positioned container div. Add an absolutely positioned ::before pseudo-element to the button with a green border and scale + opacity animation. Apply the pulse-ring CSS animation class to the button wrapper.
If there is a separate 'Register Now' CTA button on the landing/home page outside the Hero component, wrap it in a relative-positioned container and apply the same pulse-ring animation class.

Add CSS keyframe animation 'pulse-ring' that scales from 1 to 1.5-2x and fades opacity from 0.6 to 0 over 2s, looping infinitely. Define .pulse-ring-btn class with ::before pseudo-element for the expanding ring effect.

requirements.summary: Add smooth number count-up animation to the registration counter in the Hero section
acceptanceCriteria: The registration counter in the Hero section animates from 0 to the fetched value on load.
The count-up animation takes approximately 1–2 seconds.
If the backend returns 0 or is loading, the animation either skips or shows 0.
The final displayed value matches the actual backend registration count.

file_operations.description: Implement a count-up animation using requestAnimationFrame or a setInterval-based approach in a useEffect hook. When the registration count data is fetched, animate the displayed number from 0 to the target value over 1500ms with easing. Use a local state variable for the animated count display.

requirements.summary: Add subtle parallax scrolling effect to the Hero section background
acceptanceCriteria: The hero background moves at a visibly slower pace than the page content when scrolling.
The parallax effect is smooth and does not cause layout shifts or jank.
The foreground hero content (title, timer, buttons) scrolls at normal speed.
The effect is disabled or gracefully degraded on mobile if it causes performance issues.

file_operations.description: Add a scroll event listener using useEffect that calculates the scroll offset and applies a transform: translateY() style to the hero background layer (particles canvas or background image container). Use requestAnimationFrame for smooth updates. Apply the parallax effect only on desktop viewports (min-width: 768px). The background should move at 0.5x the scroll speed.
